sentences.en: Here vegetation is exiguous, edaphic barren, drought little rain, natural disaster is frequent.
sentences.cn: 这里植被稀少, 土壤瘠薄, 干旱少雨, 自然灾难频繁.

sentences.en: The rest of the old man's exiguous savings are donated to that boy.
sentences.cn: 那老人微薄积蓄中的剩余部分都捐赠给了那个男孩。

sentences.en: This area undulating hills, vegetation is exiguous, land backbone is thin.
sentences.cn: 该地区山峦起伏, 植被稀少, 土地脊薄.
